attributes.action: STOP the unsafe transportation of pets in vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand that all (pets)animals being transported in vehicles must be secured in a crate for the duration of the journey. The Crate must have access to water and must be ventilated at all times. This should prevent escape onto the highway during accidents and STOP injury to vehicle occupants and pets if an accident should occur.
